name: PlasMachine
description:
This game was made in the Scratch engine, also sorry if it is a little bit buggy...

Instructions:

- Use WASD or arrow keys to move

- Use Q or O (<-) and E or P (->) to rotate your plasma ball

- Press space, Z or click to shoot

- Press R to attract the plasma ball (Almost useless)

Lore:

-The story starts in the 32th century. Humanity has discovered the potential of plasma, and with it they have managed to make powerful machinery, including the ''Plasmachines''. ''Plasmachines'' are extremely powerful war machines that use the new plasma technology

ZONES LORE:

- The desert is the ruins of the first war with ''Plasmachines''

- The city is an active civilization with plasma technology

- The final factory is the most important plasma generator on earth, which has been used for numerous wars with plasma technology

PLAYER LORE:

-The player belongs to a foundation called P.E.W (Plasma Equals War) that wants to stop plasma technology, and our player is just one of the thousands of spaceships that have been sent to destroy the plasma generator

-The reason why the P.E.W foundation uses plasma even though they are against plasma technology is because it is so powerful that they need to resort to their own enemy to destroy the generator

Thank you for playing :)
